00017 #ifndef BT_SPARSE_SDF_H
00018 #define BT_SPARSE_SDF_H

00023 // Modified Paul Hsieh hash
00024 template <const int DWORDLEN>
00025 unsigned int HsiehHash(const void* pdata)
00026 {
00027         const unsigned short*   data=(const unsigned short*)pdata;
00028         unsigned                                hash=DWORDLEN<<2,tmp;
00029         for(int i=0;i<DWORDLEN;++i)
00030         {
00031                 hash    +=      data[0];
00032                 tmp             =       (data[1]<<11)^hash;
00033                 hash    =       (hash<<16)^tmp;
00034                 data    +=      2;
00035                 hash    +=      hash>>11;
00036         }
00037         hash^=hash<<3;hash+=hash>>5;
00038         hash^=hash<<4;hash+=hash>>17;
00039         hash^=hash<<25;hash+=hash>>6;
00040         return(hash);
00041 }
00042 
00043 template <const int CELLSIZE>
00044 struct  btSparseSdf
00045 {
00046         //
00047         // Inner types
00048         //
00049         struct IntFrac
00050         {
00051                 int                                     b;
00052                 int                                     i;
00053                 btScalar                        f;
00054         };
00055         struct  Cell
00056         {
00057                 btScalar                        d[CELLSIZE+1][CELLSIZE+1][CELLSIZE+1];
00058                 int                                     c[3];
00059                 int                                     puid;
00060                 unsigned                        hash;
00061                 const btCollisionShape* pclient;
00062                 Cell*                           next;
00063         };
00064         //
00065         // Fields
00066         //
00067 
00068         btAlignedObjectArray<Cell*>             cells;  
00069         btScalar                                                voxelsz;
00070         int                                                             puid;
00071         int                                                             ncells;
00072         int                                                             m_clampCells;
00073         int                                                             nprobes;
00074         int                                                             nqueries;       
00075 
00076         //
00077         // Methods
00078         //
00079 
00080         //
00081         void                                    Initialize(int hashsize=2383, int clampCells = 256*1024)
00082         {
00083                 //avoid a crash due to running out of memory, so clamp the maximum number of cells allocated
00084                 //if this limit is reached, the SDF is reset (at the cost of some performance during the reset)
00085                 m_clampCells = clampCells;
00086                 cells.resize(hashsize,0);
00087                 Reset();
00088         }
00089         //
00090         void                                    Reset()
00091         {
00092                 for(int i=0,ni=cells.size();i<ni;++i)
00093                 {
00094                         Cell*   pc=cells[i];
00095                         cells[i]=0;
00096                         while(pc)
00097                         {
00098                                 Cell*   pn=pc->next;
00099                                 delete pc;
00100                                 pc=pn;
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103                 voxelsz         =0.25;
00104                 puid            =0;
00105                 ncells          =0;
00106                 nprobes         =1;
00107                 nqueries        =1;
00108         }
00109         //
00110         void                                    GarbageCollect(int lifetime=256)
00111         {
00112                 const int life=puid-lifetime;
00113                 for(int i=0;i<cells.size();++i)
00114                 {
00115                         Cell*&  root=cells[i];
00116                         Cell*   pp=0;
00117                         Cell*   pc=root;
00118                         while(pc)
00119                         {
00120                                 Cell*   pn=pc->next;
00121                                 if(pc->puid<life)
00122                                 {
00123                                         if(pp) pp->next=pn; else root=pn;
00124                                         delete pc;pc=pp;--ncells;
00125                                 }
00126                                 pp=pc;pc=pn;
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 //printf("GC[%d]: %d cells, PpQ: %f\r\n",puid,ncells,nprobes/(btScalar)nqueries);
00130                 nqueries=1;
00131                 nprobes=1;
00132                 ++puid; 
00133                 /* else setup a priority list...                                                */ 
00134         }
00135         //
00136         int                                             RemoveReferences(btCollisionShape* pcs)
00137         {
00138                 int     refcount=0;
00139                 for(int i=0;i<cells.size();++i)
00140                 {
00141                         Cell*&  root=cells[i];
00142                         Cell*   pp=0;
00143                         Cell*   pc=root;
00144                         while(pc)
00145                         {
00146                                 Cell*   pn=pc->next;
00147                                 if(pc->pclient==pcs)
00148                                 {
00149                                         if(pp) pp->next=pn; else root=pn;
00150                                         delete pc;pc=pp;++refcount;
00151                                 }
00152                                 pp=pc;pc=pn;
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155                 return(refcount);
00156         }
00157         //
00158         btScalar                                Evaluate(       const btVector3& x,
00159                 const btCollisionShape* shape,
00160                 btVector3& normal,
00161                 btScalar margin)
00162         {
00163                 /* Lookup cell                  */ 
00164                 const btVector3 scx=x/voxelsz;
00165                 const IntFrac   ix=Decompose(scx.x());
00166                 const IntFrac   iy=Decompose(scx.y());
00167                 const IntFrac   iz=Decompose(scx.z());
00168                 const unsigned  h=Hash(ix.b,iy.b,iz.b,shape);
00169                 Cell*&                  root=cells[static_cast<int>(h%cells.size())];
00170                 Cell*                   c=root;
00171                 ++nqueries;
00172                 while(c)
00173                 {
00174                         ++nprobes;
00175                         if(     (c->hash==h)    &&
00176                                 (c->c[0]==ix.b) &&
00177                                 (c->c[1]==iy.b) &&
00178                                 (c->c[2]==iz.b) &&
00179                                 (c->pclient==shape))
00180                         { break; }
00181                         else
00182                         { c=c->next; }
00183                 }
00184                 if(!c)
00185                 {
00186                         ++nprobes;              
00187                         ++ncells;
00188                         //int sz = sizeof(Cell);
00189                         if (ncells>m_clampCells)
00190                         {
00191                                 static int numResets=0;
00192                                 numResets++;
00193 //                              printf("numResets=%d\n",numResets);
00194                                 Reset();
00195                         }
00196 
00197                         c=new Cell();
00198                         c->next=root;root=c;
00199                         c->pclient=shape;
00200                         c->hash=h;
00201                         c->c[0]=ix.b;c->c[1]=iy.b;c->c[2]=iz.b;
00202                         BuildCell(*c);
00203                 }
00204                 c->puid=puid;
00205                 /* Extract infos                */ 
00206                 const int               o[]={   ix.i,iy.i,iz.i};
00207                 const btScalar  d[]={   c->d[o[0]+0][o[1]+0][o[2]+0],
00208                         c->d[o[0]+1][o[1]+0][o[2]+0],
00209                         c->d[o[0]+1][o[1]+1][o[2]+0],
00210                         c->d[o[0]+0][o[1]+1][o[2]+0],
00211                         c->d[o[0]+0][o[1]+0][o[2]+1],
00212                         c->d[o[0]+1][o[1]+0][o[2]+1],
00213                         c->d[o[0]+1][o[1]+1][o[2]+1],
00214                         c->d[o[0]+0][o[1]+1][o[2]+1]};
00215                 /* Normal       */ 
00216 #if 1
00217                 const btScalar  gx[]={  d[1]-d[0],d[2]-d[3],
00218                         d[5]-d[4],d[6]-d[7]};
00219                 const btScalar  gy[]={  d[3]-d[0],d[2]-d[1],
00220                         d[7]-d[4],d[6]-d[5]};
00221                 const btScalar  gz[]={  d[4]-d[0],d[5]-d[1],
00222                         d[7]-d[3],d[6]-d[2]};
00223                 normal.setX(Lerp(       Lerp(gx[0],gx[1],iy.f),
00224                         Lerp(gx[2],gx[3],iy.f),iz.f));
00225                 normal.setY(Lerp(       Lerp(gy[0],gy[1],ix.f),
00226                         Lerp(gy[2],gy[3],ix.f),iz.f));
00227                 normal.setZ(Lerp(       Lerp(gz[0],gz[1],ix.f),
00228                         Lerp(gz[2],gz[3],ix.f),iy.f));
00229                 normal          =       normal.normalized();
00230 #else
00231                 normal          =       btVector3(d[1]-d[0],d[3]-d[0],d[4]-d[0]).normalized();
00232 #endif
00233                 /* Distance     */ 
00234                 const btScalar  d0=Lerp(Lerp(d[0],d[1],ix.f),
00235                         Lerp(d[3],d[2],ix.f),iy.f);
00236                 const btScalar  d1=Lerp(Lerp(d[4],d[5],ix.f),
00237                         Lerp(d[7],d[6],ix.f),iy.f);
00238                 return(Lerp(d0,d1,iz.f)-margin);
00239         }
00240         //
00241         void                                    BuildCell(Cell& c)
00242         {
00243                 const btVector3 org=btVector3(  (btScalar)c.c[0],
00244                         (btScalar)c.c[1],
00245                         (btScalar)c.c[2])       *
00246                         CELLSIZE*voxelsz;
00247                 for(int k=0;k<=CELLSIZE;++k)
00248                 {
00249                         const btScalar  z=voxelsz*k+org.z();
00250                         for(int j=0;j<=CELLSIZE;++j)
00251                         {
00252                                 const btScalar  y=voxelsz*j+org.y();
00253                                 for(int i=0;i<=CELLSIZE;++i)
00254                                 {
00255                                         const btScalar  x=voxelsz*i+org.x();
00256                                         c.d[i][j][k]=DistanceToShape(   btVector3(x,y,z),
00257                                                 c.pclient);
00258                                 }
00259                         }
00260                 }
00261         }
00262         //
00263         static inline btScalar  DistanceToShape(const btVector3& x,
00264                 const btCollisionShape* shape)
00265         {
00266                 btTransform     unit;
00267                 unit.setIdentity();
00268                 if(shape->isConvex())
00269                 {
00270                         btGjkEpaSolver2::sResults       res;
00271                         const btConvexShape*                            csh=static_cast<const btConvexShape*>(shape);
00272                         return(btGjkEpaSolver2::SignedDistance(x,0,csh,unit,res));
00273                 }
00274                 return(0);
00275         }
00276         //
00277         static inline IntFrac   Decompose(btScalar x)
00278         {
00279                 /* That one need a lot of improvements...       */
00280                 /* Remove test, faster floor...                         */ 
00281                 IntFrac                 r;
00282                 x/=CELLSIZE;
00283                 const int               o=x<0?(int)(-x+1):0;
00284                 x+=o;r.b=(int)x;
00285                 const btScalar  k=(x-r.b)*CELLSIZE;
00286                 r.i=(int)k;r.f=k-r.i;r.b-=o;
00287                 return(r);
00288         }
00289         //
00290         static inline btScalar  Lerp(btScalar a,btScalar b,btScalar t)
00291         {
00292                 return(a+(b-a)*t);
00293         }
00294 
00295 
00296 
00297         //
00298         static inline unsigned int      Hash(int x,int y,int z,const btCollisionShape* shape)
00299         {
00300                 struct btS
00301                 { 
00302                         int x,y,z;
00303                         void* p;
00304                 };
00305 
00306                 btS myset;
00307 
00308                 myset.x=x;myset.y=y;myset.z=z;myset.p=(void*)shape;
00309                 const void* ptr = &myset;
00310 
00311                 unsigned int result = HsiehHash<sizeof(btS)/4> (ptr);
00312 
00313 
00314                 return result;
00315         }
00316 };
